title: "open previous windows and tabs" no longer works.
content:
I recently updated to windows 11 and now when I open firefox my tabs are no longer there. I have repeatedly gone into settings and checked "open previous windows and tabs". Dosnt work. Still opens to a blank browser with only one 'new tab' present. Most troublesome since having my tabs for my email addresses, calender and google keep come up each time is a big time saver for me. Ive been doing this for years and thanked mozilla silently many times for this. But now Whats Up???

Hope someone can help. I see it was posted last year but none of the response makes sense/applies to me.
creator: lk3w99

title: sync wont work
content:
HD crashed, had to rebuild. Installed Firefox, logged in, everything was great. Not the first time I have synced my account, its always worked before.

Initially, the sync worked but then I made a ADUC group membership change on my account. Someone had added domain-guest membership to my account which was deleting my windows profile every time i logged off. I removed the domain-guest membership and now my windows profile is saved but my firefox sync refuses to work. It completes but none of my information is there. I've been working on this for 6 hours, trying to load a backup to my profile, nothing works. What a nightmare.

I've pasted a copy of my old profile i had before my HD crashed. I pasted it into the profile location on the rebuild but firefox -profilemanager does NOT list the profiles i pasted into the folder, i have no idea why. They ARE there but it will not list them so i can't select them.

Ideas?
creator: millera10

title: Malicious redirect
content:
I can't open any youtube shorts, because I get redirected to anti-war videos, or some random videos that got a million views (which I'm guessing they got from other victims of this malware).

I've disabled all extensions and even plugins, restarted Firefox, but the problem persists.

I have an anti-virus installed (Kaspersky), so I'm at a loss of what this could be.

Is there any way to trace the source of the redirect?
creator: plextor

title: Firefox REFUSES To Connect To Hotmail/REFUSES To Refresh Hotmail
content: ONCE AGAIN, I am having Hotmail issues through Firefox, and ONLY through Firefox!!! I had to go to PALE MOON AGAIN to use Hotmail. This is getting REALLY irritating. I can go to ANY OTHER website through Firefox with no issue, but Hotmaill? Oh no, of course not. Your damn browser refuses to cooperate and Hotmail just sits there for the past TWENTY-FOUR HOURS with a waiting symbol and stalls out, refusing to do ANYTHING to refresh the page, and when I try and open an email, Hotmail says, "We're sorry, we can't display that message right now." But when I use Pale Moon, NO PROBLEMS WHATSOEVER!!!! FIx your damn browser to work with Hotmail CORRECTLY this is YOUR problem!!! Since it works FINE through Pale Moon the problem is OBVIOUSLY with YOU!!! I am so sick and tired of YOUR BROWSER stalling out and causing issues ALL THE TIME! DO SOMETHING!!!
creator: Delenn

title: Cannot locate Profiles
content: My HDD crashed, and I have to re-install all my software, starting with Win 10. I have downloaded and installed the latest Thunderbird. I have backed up the C: drive a few days earlier. In my Thunderbird prior to the crash, I have three email addresses , and each one is filtered to store emails in a lot of Local folders. I went to the backup version, and recovered my Profile folder in Users/UserName /Roaming/Thunderbird folder, which merged with the newly installed Profile. When I opened Thunderbird after rebooting the PC, only my first email address was shown, and there were no filters or Local folders to be seen. Can someone please advise me on how to restore Thunderbird to my original configuration with 3 email addresses, filters and Local folders? kind regards, Joe
creator: joeslaven

title: "Ask everytime" for cookies ?
content:
Every & then, this problem is filed over mozilla support, it's contributors just straight up archive the issue. Please don't do such nonsense.

On firefox v44, ability to ask to save cookies for each every website was being removed. And it's defaulted to save cookies permanently. I could change it to delete after current session. But the issue is, I have to keep track of all savable cookies manually, which is a hor$s$shit task. If anyone know how to do this on latest firefox, please lemme know.
creator: pcoop

title: Opening Firefox from a link restores previous session. Opening from Menu doesn't.
content:
I've been using Firefox on Ubuntu since years ago, I use Firefox Sync and I have the browser configured to always restore previous session.

Some days ago I installed KDE desktop (I don't know if it has something to do with the issue) but since then, if I open Firefox from the panel or the KDE menu, it neither restore the previous session nor logs in Firefox Sync.

Either if I leave that new window open or not, If I click a http/https link, for example, from a Thunderbird email, it will open a new Firefox window with the last session and Firefox Sync logged in.

So, if I want to start with the last session tabs, I must open Firefox from an external link.

What can be the reason?

Thanks in advance!
creator: dr.spock75

title: Can't swipe between apps when playing video in fullscreen Mac
content: If I were to put a YouTube video into fullscreen, it would do so and lock the screen in fullscreen. However, when this happens, unlike with any other browser, I can't swipe between apps with the 3/4 finger gesture on mac. I have to exit (esc) from fullscreen before I can use or see anything else on my desktop. If I were to use F11 to fullscreen just the browser it switches between apps fine, but when putting videos specifically in fullscreen (F) so it expands the entire screen, it locks the screen. Not sure why this happens or how to fix this.

title: implementazione su firefox
content: Salve, uso Firefox da qualche decennio, ma ho sempre notato un disagio nelle pagina di gestione delle password. Mi spiego meglio: Su un determinato sito accedo con più profili, quindi con diversi account formati da nome utente (numerico) e password (alfanumerica), quando mi serve accedere con un determinato profilo non so mai quale sia quello giusto!. Per ovviare al problema, mi chiedevo se fosse possibile implementare nella stessa pagina un "campo" note da abbinare ad ogni singolo account cosi da poter sapere con quale credenziali accedere.? L'immagine allegata mostra come dovrebbe presentarsi la pagina. Sicuro di un riscontro Saluto Cordialmente. Luigi Barbati

creator: mitch.amo

title: Chybné načtení stránky s připojením přes proxy
content: Dobrý den. Používáme FireFox ve firemním prostředí. V poslední době od doby kdy vyšla verze 102 se začalo stávat, že některé webové stránky nejdou načíst celé. Načte se pouze jejich část a zobrazí jen to co načetl. Stránky by měli být naprogramovány správně. Problém se objevuje u více osob ve firmě a pravděpodobně to souvisí s nastavením proxy serveru. S naším proxy serverem se nějaké změny nekonaly. Když změním nastavení ve FireFoxu na "Automatické zjištění konfigurace proxy serverů" objeví se chyba uvedená výše. Když měním nastavení na "" tak se objevují zase jiné problémy, třeba nenačítají se externí fonty z Google API, aj. Žádná z dostupných položek proxy neřeší daný problém. Ve verzích nižších než 102.x.x se tento problém nevyskytuje a prohlížeč načítá stránky v pořádku. Jak mohu problém opravit?
creator: lukas.kysela

title: Artstation and a blank screen
content:
Hello,

I'm having trouble with Artstation, and to be specific, whenever I click on an image to look at full, a blank screen shows up instead of the usual webpage format. The home page is fine, and the artists home page are fine, but when I click on an image, it's just a blank white page.

I've tried trouble shooting mode, and it seems to be one of my extensions - I use the bare minimum of the recommended set. I would like to not lose any of them - 1Password, Cookie AutoDelete, Disable WebRTC, Firefox's own Multi-Container extension, Ghostery, HTTPS everywhere, and uBlock Origin - for my own web browsing needs & I feel it unnecessary to use a different browser for one specific website. All the usual sites I venture out to work fine, it's just when clicking on the images to look at full view.

I do apologize for my ignorance if this question is more suited for Artstations support team, but thought it'd be best to ask here first.

So what actions should I take next, other than going one by one for each extension?

Many thanks in advance.
creator: mrernestbert
